summary: A little mod that adds little details and secrets to the Riverwood area of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=3]Mod Details[/size]
 [/b]
[list][*]Adds a boat wreck near Riverwood. (With mini event).
[/*]
[*](Mini event) linked to boat wreck.
[/*]
[*]Small detail in Sven's house.
[/*]
[*]Adds a small hideout on the east road leaving Riverwood.
[/*]
[*]Adds a small detail in Hod, and Gurders house
[/*]
[*]Mini event linked to Hod, and Gurder's house.
[/*]
[*][b] [/b]
[/*]
[/list][b][size=3]Reason for the mod[/size][/b]
 
I am on a current play through of skyrim and noticed that I was checking every little nook and cranny for little hidden details and items,
but I wasn't finding cool little details and items. So i made this mod that
adds a few details to Riverwood, so players like me that scour the map for
details find neat little items and other things. I thought mods like this could
help reward players like me that look for every detail by giving them little
treasures and secrets. If you read all this I thank you very much.
[b]
[size=3]Plans for expansion[/size][/b]
 
As of now I do not plan on adding anything more than a few more little details to Riverwood. But if the mod gets enough feedback I might
add little details to all the cities and holds of skyrim. So if you have any
constructive criticism let me know.[/center][center]
[b][size=3]Expansion[/size][/b]
[b]As of now I do not plan on expanding beyond Riverwood, but if the feedback is good then I may add to all the holds, and cities of Skyrim.
[/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3][b]Compatibility
[/b][/size]There should not be any mod clashes, unless the mod changes any of the Riverwood cells.[/center]
author: Monstercreations
